name: Winky Toss
description:
(Downloadable version below this description if you'd prefer to play that way)

I really like Lilli from "Going Under" so I made a fan game where you play as her serving items to customers in Winky Dinks.

Controls are use the arrow keys to move from door to door and click QWER to throw the customers the right items.

Five levels of increasing difficulties.

Gallery rewards with my best attempt at art and the sketch versions are unlocked if you perfect the level.

I don't know if the game can save in browser but the downloaded version should save your progress between playthroughs.

Characters and Music taken from "Aggro Crab"'s game "Going Under" so if you like the designs of these characters go play that game.
